Articles.Content: I have a mod throttle controlled avionics which is similar to mock Jeb but it's particularly built to help with VTOL flight however keep the mod balanced some command modules will not have TCA available however I don't know why but now no command modules have TC available not even modules that had it before is there some way to fix this, did I install something wrong and if there is no way to fix this is there a way I should modify a config file so that all command modules will have TCA
